summary: User requests ability to specify a different task queue when using continueAsNew to transition a workflow to a new execution. The feature is already supported by ContinueAsNewOptions but is not properly exposed in the public API documentation.
userImpact: Users cannot easily discover or use the existing task queue parameter when continuing workflows as new, requiring workarounds or external guidance.
rootCause: ContinueAsNewOptions type was not exported from the public API, making it inaccessible to users despite the functionality being implemented.
proposedFix: Export ContinueAsNewOptions from the public API and update documentation to show task queue parameter usage.
workaround: Users can reference the internal definition and manually construct options, but this is not discoverable.
resolutionDetails: ContinueAsNewOptions was exported and documentation was updated to properly expose the task queue parameter.
keyQuote: ContinueAsNewOptions already does in fact allow setting a task queue, so this should work already.
